        public Z4Layer​(java.lang.String name,
               int width,
               int height,
               java.lang.Object filling,
               int containerWidth,
               int containerHeight)
        Creates the object
        Parameters:
        name - The layer name
        width - The layer width
        height - The layer height
        filling - The filling (an instance of Color, Z4AbstractFiller or Z4BiGradientColor)
        containerWidth - The container width
        containerHeight - The container height
